title: NA to EUW, difference in ping?
body: I'd like to play with some friends in Europe. my ping is 27 in Kentucky, how much will it change after the server change?{{champion:55}}

replies.body: I'm from the UK. I usually get 27 ping on EUW, and when I play on NA I get roughly 111 Ping. It's safe to assume you'd get roughly the same, give or a take about 15. My friend from PA gets roughly the same when on EUW.

Oooooo I have a good way that you can test that on your own end. Grab [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and try running a trace route to our EU servers. Take a look at the ping and that should give you a good idea of what your connection would be like going to the EU servers. 

EUW: 192.64.170.252
EUNE: 31.186.224.42
